parameters.text: Type a 4-letter word in the text box below, then try to match it with the number pad.

hints.GameState.GestureActivity.SwipingUp: Touch the screen and swipe up to follow the indicator.
hints.GameState.GestureActivity.TooFarLeft: Swipe left and follow the indicator.
hints.GameState.GestureActivity.TooFarRight: Swipe right and follow the indicator.
hints.GameState.GestureActivity.ActivityComple: Well done! You have completed the gesture exercise.
